snippet.title: inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories | Official Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
"inKONBINI: One Store. Many Stories" is a meditative narrative adventure / simulation game that puts you in the shoes of Makoto Hayakawa, a college student taking a break from her studies to help her aunt at the small-town convenience store.

WISHLIST NOW! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2723430/inKONBINI_One_Store_Many_Stories/

Play inKONBINI to discover joy and wonder hidden behind the daily routine of a konbini worker. Engage in meaningful conversations with your customers and see how their stories intertwine in a beautifully-rendered early 1990s setting.

inKONBINI is currently in development at Nagai Industries for PC, Mac, and home consoles.

Learn more about the game at: http://inkonbini.com/

—
Nagai Industries is a compact, diverse team of highly-skilled video game creators focused on delivering accessible, high-quality interactive experiences with strong narrative elements.

Follow Nagai Industries!

X (Twitter): https://twitter.com/nagaiindustries
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nagaiindustries/
Blue Sky: https://bsky.app/profile/nagaiindustries.bsky.social
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/nagai-industries/

#announcement #trailer #narrative #adventure #simulation #videogame #1990s #Japan #relaxing #cozy #wholesome #interactive #convenience #store #konbini
